message: This is the first round. I'm offering you a product for $1000000. I don't know its value to you, but I'll give you a 100% refund if you decide not to buy it. If you buy it, you'll find out its quality after the fact. If it's high-quality, I'll consider it a good purchase. If it's low-quality, I'll consider it a bad purchase. Please let me know your decision.

I'll take the product. I'll consider it a good purchase if it's high-quality and a bad purchase if it's low-quality. I'm willing to take the risk of potentially getting a low-quality product for $1000000.

You've taken the risk and bought the first product, and it turned out to be a bad purchase.
